Imparfait (Imperfect).J'emmenais: I used to take / I used to take along
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu emmenais: You used to take / You used to take along
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle emmenait: He/She used to take / He/She used to take along
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous emmenions: We used to take / We used to take along
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous emmeniez: You used to take / You used to take along (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles emmenaient: They used to take / They used to take along

Futur simple (Simple Future).J'emmènerai: I will take / I will take along
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu emmèneras: You will take / You will take along
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle emmènera: He/She will take / He/She will take along
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous emmènerons: We will take / We will take along
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous emmènerez: You will take / You will take along (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles emmèneront: They will take / They will take along
